original: Öm, Ragnar Vilhelm, disponent, Påskallavik, f. 15/6/01 i Köla, Värml. 1., av konsul G. O. o. Josefine Örn. G. 29 m. Barbara Boddy. Barn: Ste-phan f. 31, Monica 33. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 22, stud. i Tyskl. o. Frankr. 22, 23’. Kadett v. KAI 23-26, anst. v. agen-turer i London 27-29, avd :chef h. Nil-sen & Co. Ltd A-B i Sthlm 29-32, anst. v. ag. i London 3’3-34, försäljn :chef f. A-B EmsfoTs Bruk 34-38, disp. där fr. 38, verkst. dir. där fr. 47. Styr:led. i A-B Emsfors Bruk.
translated: Öm, Ragnar Vilhelm, manager, Påskallavik, b. 15/6/01 in Köla, Värmland. 1st son of consul G. O. and Josefine Örn. Married on 29 with Barbara Boddy. Children: Stephan b. 31, Monica b. 33. — Completed high school in Stockholm in 22, studied in Germany and France in 22, 23. Cadet at KAI from 23-26, employed at agencies in London from 27-29, department manager at Nilsen & Co. Ltd A-B in Stockholm from 29-32, employed at agencies in London from 33-34, sales manager at A-B Emsfors Bruk from 34-38, and manager from 38. Executive director there from 47. Board member at A-B Emsfors Bruk.
